# PHCollectionListType

**Enumeration**

Major distinctions between kinds of collection list, used by the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHCollectionList/collectionListType] property and [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHCollectionList/fetchCollectionLists(with:subtype:options:)] method.

## Declaration

```swift
enum PHCollectionListType
```

## Constants

- **PHCollectionListType.momentList**: A group of asset collections of type [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetCollectionType/moment].
- **PHCollectionListType.folder**: A folder containing asset collections of type [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetCollectionType/album] or [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetCollectionType/smartAlbum].
- **PHCollectionListType.smartFolder**: A smart folder synced to the device from .

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Reading Collection List Metadata

- **collectionListType**: The type of asset collection group that the collection list represents.
- **collectionListSubtype**: The type of asset collection grouping the collection list represents.
- **PHCollectionListSubtype**: Major distinctions between kinds of collection list, used by the [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHCollectionList/collectionListSubtype] property and [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHCollectionList/fetchCollectionLists(with:subtype:options:)], [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHCollectionList/fetchMomentLists(with:containingMoment:options:)], and [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHCollectionList/fetchMomentLists(with:options:)] methods.
- **startDate**: The earliest creation date among all assets in the collection list.
- **endDate**: The latest creation date among all assets in the collection list.
- **localizedLocationNames**: The names of locations grouped by the collection (an array of `NSString` objects).

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
